item.title: Master 2 - Human Computer Interaction: Lab Homework 2 – Mobile Controls & Deployment for ML-Agents Project
item.description: Adapting the TrackBot reinforcement learning environment to mobile using on-screen buttons and deploying the Unity build to Android.

item.title: Master 2 - Human Computer Interaction: Lab Homework 1 – Blog Setup & Unity ML-Agents Environment
item.description: Setting up an online blog, configuring Unity ML-Agents, testing environments, overcoming issues, and extending the baseline scenario.
